sentences.sentence: More men are finding out that the joys of work have been overrated.
sentences.translation: 更多的男士正发现工作的种种乐趣被高估了。

sentences.sentence: This hard-won sense of self-acceptance is one of the joys of being an older woman.
sentences.translation: 这种来之不易的自我接受感是老年女性的乐趣之一。

sentences.sentence: This showed that they were awaking to an appreciation of life and its joys once more.
sentences.translation: 这表明他们正再次醒悟，开始欣赏生活及其乐趣。
